nodes.text: Raus Place was a business operating in Saleucami town, that was advertised by a glowing sign.

The name of the business was developed for "Cut and Run," the second episode of Star Wars: The Bad Batch as letters written on a billboard in an unknown writing system. Although the billboard isn't visible in the episode itself, it was shown in a concept art image included in the episode guide for "Cut and Run" on StarWars.com.
